snippet: The harrowing assault stunned many in Brazil, especially as Rio de Janeiro tries to promote itself as a city on the mend and prepares to host the 2014 World Cup and 2016 Olympic Games.
abstract: Brazilian police say American woman was raped by three men aboard public van in six-hour abduction that began in seaside district of Copacabana; assault stuns many in Brazil, especially as Rio de Janeiro tries to promote itself as city on mend and prepares to host 2014 World Cup and 2016 Olympics.

byline.original: By SIMON ROMERO and TAYLOR BARNES

lead_paragraph: The harrowing assault stunned many in Brazil, especially as Rio de Janeiro tries to promote itself as a city on the mend and prepares to host the 2014 World Cup and 2016 Olympic Games.

headline.seo: American Woman Gang-Raped on Transit Van in Rio de Janeiro
headline.main: American Woman Gang-Raped and Beaten on Brazilian Transit Van
headline.print_headline: American Woman Gang-Raped and Beaten on Brazilian Transit Van
